content: <tkstanczak> <@393833580033474560> cool thing - my favourite quote: "It is possible to do like to do it like a lot to do stuff, right?"

content: <tkstanczak> In general it is readable, are there any features to mark the speakers for each part?

author: eth2_gitter_bot

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <gichiba> Unfortunately neither can be done... But I've posted a much leaner digest of the call here: https://ethresear.ch/t/stateless-ethereum-march-25th-call-digest/7202

content: <tkstanczak> it is fantastic, headers / speakers would be just an improvement and it will be probably possible in the future
